validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.usernameInvalid: Username must contain only letters and numbers
validation.titleMinLength: Campaign title must be at least 3 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Campaign description must be at least 10 characters
validation.targetAmountInvalid: Target amount must be a valid number
validation.targetAmountPositive: Target amount must be greater than zero
validation.targetAmountMax: Target amount cannot exceed 10 million SAR
validation.startDateInvalid: Start date must be a valid date
validation.startDatePast: Start date cannot be in the past
validation.endDateInvalid: End date must be a valid date
validation.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date

messages.noCampaignData: No data found for this campaign
messages.pleaseWait: Please wait while we fetch campaign details
messages.errorLoadingCampaignDetails: Error occurred while loading campaign details

home.description: Browse the available campaigns on our platform and discover humanitarian and social initiatives that need your support. You can choose the causes that matter to you, whether related to education, health, food, or emergency relief. Your donation, no matter the size, directly contributes to improving others' lives and creating a tangible positive impact. Be part of the change and help build a better future!
home.campaignsDescription: Browse available campaigns and donate to help achieve their goals.

stats.countries: Number of Countries Participating in the Platform

upload.dragDropOrClick: Drag and drop image here or click to upload

hero.title: Digital Donation Platform
hero.description: We are a digital platform that aims to connect donors with impactful humanitarian and social campaigns. We believe in the power of giving to change the world and create a better future for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to create a more just and compassionate world by facilitating the donation process and connecting generous hearts with causes that need support. We believe that every donation, no matter how small, can make a big difference in the lives of others.
mission.visionText: A world where everyone comes together to help those in need

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: We provide an exceptional and secure donation experience that ensures your contribution reaches those who deserve it

secure.title: Security & Reliability
secure.description: We ensure the security of all transactions and personal data using the latest encryption technologies

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: We support more than 30 countries worldwide in multiple languages and different currencies

instant.title: Instant Donation
instant.description: Donate easily and quickly through our secure and reliable platform

transparent.title: Complete Transparency
transparent.description: Track your donations and see the direct impact of your contributions

howItWorks.title: How the Platform Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to make a difference in others' lives

browse.title: Browse Campaigns
browse.description: Browse different campaigns and choose the cause that interests you

donate.title: Donate Securely
donate.description: Choose the amount and donate easily through a secure payment system

track.title: Track Impact
track.description: See how your donation contributed to achieving the required goal

cta.title: Join Us in the Journey of Giving
cta.description: Be part of a community of donors who believe in the power of giving to change the world

hero.title: How Our Donation Platform Works
hero.description: Learn how our platform works step by step, whether you want to donate to an existing campaign or create a new campaign for a cause you care about.

donors.title: For Donors
donors.subtitle: Three simple steps to start your giving journey

browse.title: Browse Campaigns
browse.description: Explore available campaigns and choose the cause that interests you from various humanitarian and social fields
browse.detail1: Browse by category (education, health, relief, etc.)
browse.detail2: Read details of each campaign and its objectives
browse.detail3: Check campaign progress towards its goal

donate.title: Donate Securely
donate.description: Choose the amount you want to donate and complete the payment process securely through our encrypted payment system
donate.detail1: Choose the donation amount that suits you
donate.detail2: Enter your details or donate anonymously
donate.detail3: Pay securely through encrypted payment gateway

track.title: Track Impact
track.description: Follow how your donation contributed to achieving the campaign goals and receive regular updates
track.detail3: Get updates on how donations are used

creators.title: For Campaign Creators
creators.subtitle: How to create a successful campaign on our platform

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Register a new account and verify your identity to ensure transparency and security

create.title: Create Campaign
create.description: Create your campaign with clear details, specific objectives, and attach required documents
create.detail1: Write compelling campaign title and description
create.detail2: Set financial goal and time duration

launch.title: Launch Campaign
launch.description: After admin approval, publish your campaign and start collecting donations and updating donors

platformFeatures.title: Platform Features
platformFeatures.subtitle: What makes our platform stand out

security.title: Security First
security.description: All transactions are protected with latest encryption technologies

notifications.title: Instant Updates
notifications.description: Receive instant notifications about campaign progress

community.title: Interactive Community
community.description: Join a community of donors and charitable organizations

transparency.title: Complete Transparency
transparency.description: Track exactly how your donations are used

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is donating on the platform safe?
faq.a1: Yes, all transactions are protected with the latest encryption technologies and we follow the highest banking security standards.
faq.q2: How can I ensure my donation reaches the beneficiaries?
faq.a2: We provide regular updates on how donations are used and transparent reports on the progress of each campaign.
faq.q3: Can I create a campaign for any cause?
faq.a3: We accept humanitarian, social, and charitable campaigns, and each campaign is reviewed before approval.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Join thousands of donors who are making a real difference in the world
